test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test for products with invalid category_id
test_scenarios.description: This test scenario is designed to validate that all products have a valid category_id. The test will fail if there are any products with a category_id that does not exist in the categories table.
test_scenarios.test_scenario: Check if there are any products with a category_id that does not exist in the categories table.
test_scenarios.test_query: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[products] WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[categories] WHERE [dbo].[products].[category_id] = [dbo].[categories].[id])) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END
validation_criteria: The query should return 1 if all products have a valid category_id, and 0 if any product has an invalid category_id.

test_scenarios.description: This test scenario is designed to validate that all products have a category_id. The test will fail if there are any products without a category_id.
test_scenarios.test_scenario: Check if there are any products without a category_id.
test_scenarios.test_query: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[products] WHERE category_id IS NULL) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END
validation_criteria: The query should return 1 if all products have a category_id, and 0 if any product does not have a category_id.
